segments.text: In this kitchen, there's a sink with water steadily flowing from the faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The basin is full, and excess water spills over the front.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A woman faces the sink area, holding a plate and towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She appears concentrated on cleaning the dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A puddle forms on the floor beneath her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To one side, a boy stands on a small stool near the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He reaches into an open cabinet for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A girl stands beside him, extending her arm toward the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window above the sink reveals a garden path and plants.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains are pulled back, allowing light inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes are arranged on the counter nearby.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The overall setting feels like a typical afternoon at home.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Nothing seems out of the ordinary at first glance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But suddenly, I realize the stool might tipâ€” that's startling!
segments.speaker: PAR
